Reviews.Title: “Good”
Reviews.Author: Mobsta2011
Reviews.Content: Was in town for two days .it has new owners the rooms have been remodeled had cable,room was clean,hardly no noise all night, internet was kinda slow but on the bright side felt very safe coming and going since they also had an armed gaurd in the parking lot all night. So yes for the price ill definatly be back

Reviews.Title: “We'll never stay here again”
Reviews.Author: brbreshears
Reviews.Content: The room wasn't all that bad but nothing like the pictures showed.The air barely made the room comfortable but if you moved around to much you would be sweating. The person we booked the room with told us they had a swim pool. My husband ask the man twice and he said yes so we booked the room. We got there and guess what NO SWIM POOL. They wouldn't let us go to a different hotel since the guy lied to us. They just want to give us a coupon for 30 on our next visit. Well you can bet that it will NOT be at this motel. Don't like being lied to just to get you to book a room with them. Be truthful you might not have bad reviews.

Reviews.Title: “horriable&unclean”
Reviews.Author: PRATT35214
Reviews.Content: the pictures on the internet shows a nice and peaceful place,but the inside is a hold diffrent story.the carpet is dirty,the bath room tubs has mold around them,the beds have holes in the comforters and smell like mold.the only good thing about this place was the parking lot.

Reviews.Title: “Old, but clean and very affordable”
Reviews.Author: cfarmerbrown2
Reviews.Content: Although this hotel is a bit old, the rooms were clean. If you are looking for a place to lie your head down for the night, then this is the place. If you are looking for pampering, then this is not the place. Very close to airport and convenient to the Interstate and tourist attractions. It was just what we needed for the one night we were in town.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: graceland_visitor
Reviews.Content: The reviews that say this hotel is unsafe or a rip off are not the experience we had. I wouldn't go walking around the neighborhood alone at night but the hotel itself seemed fine. The room was very clean. Sheets and bedding seemed new. There was even free breakfast. There was some traffic noise and occasionally we could hear planes take off since it is close to the airport but overall it was quiet. I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Graceland and I would stay here again without hesitation. Very good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: travelallthetime83
Reviews.Content: WARNING!!!!!!!!!WARNING!!!!!!!!!!!!!WARNING!!!!!!!!!WARNING!!!!!!!! I called the hotel to book a couple of rooms for our church convention (COGIC) and the rate that was online was $45. The guy had the nerve to tell me the rooms were $115-$145. CAN YOU SAY SCAM!!!! SCAM!!!!! SCAM!!!! He then stated he would cut me a deal for $89.99. How in the world are you going to charge the same price as the Marriott Downtown Memphis when clearly this "MOTEL" is a hottttttttttttttttttttttttttttt messsssssssssssssss. Please Please be careful if your trying to book a room at this motel. I always always look at the reviews before I book a room and everyone was right about this hotel. The owner is crazy. The only reason I was going to book this hotel was because some people in my group are cheap so I guess you get what you pay for. DO NOT BE SCAMMED!!!!!!! WARNING!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “What a rip off”
Reviews.Author: holyprincess
Reviews.Content: I never got to stay here. What a rip off!!!!! I was going to be in town for a church convention. The desk worker tried to charge me $145 for a $45 room. He said that all the hotels would be charging around the same price because of the COGIC convention. When I explained that I had seen his regular prices online, he proceeded to say that all the rooms online are booked and people would be willing to stay at his hotel 5-6 nights for the rates and that he could cut them a deal of $115/night. This is such an unfair practice that this hotel is using to abuse possible customers. I thanked him and promptly hung up. I would not stay here or recommend this place to anyone!!!! If they are that bold in their crooked policies (shall I say lack of policies), what else are these people capable of????

Reviews.Title: “Scammed”
Reviews.Author: divinedreamer
Reviews.Content: I was traveling from NY to LA with my boss and his girlfriend. We had been traveling all day non-stop when we finally pulled over at the first hotel we saw. At around 1 am we got a room went to sleep. At around 8 am we left. When I went home to visit I looked at my mail and found a letter from the holel stating that an iron and ironing board was missing and they were charging me $48.00. Thinking it was a mistake I called up and was told that the items were missing therefore they charged me. When I explained that I had never seen an iron or ironing board and had only slept there for about 8 hours, I was told that the housekeeping checks all rooms after customers leave and that they were in there before I rented the room. I again stated that I did not take the items and asked if he was calling me a liar. He stated that it was found missing by the housekeeping. Not only was I charged for something that I did not take but I was called a liar. The hotel is not very clean nor is it in a safe area. There were mattresses leaning on the sides of the building. Beware of this place, next time it could be you and it could be the tv they charge you for.

Reviews.Title: “Bad”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Booked this for three nights, requested a non-smoking room. Owners presented it as a 3-star hotel. Was not safe - afraid to leave vehicle in parking lot. Room was reeking of cigarette smoke. Requested another room and was told that it was non-smoking. Room also smelled of smoke. I am allergic to cigarette smoke and was reacting before I got out of room. Owners insisted that because it said non-smoking on room door - that it was smoke free. We had to leave there and find a room in Memphis at 6:30 p.m. on a Saturday night. Fortunately we found one in a safer neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay at reasonable rates”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed a few times in this motel. It's located close to Graceland and the Memphis Airport. It's a nice alternative for visitors to Graceland. Most of the hotels/motels have high(er) rates during Elvis birthday week (in January) and Elvis Memorial week (August) but this motel always has its reasonable (lower) rates. Clean rooms, nothing fancy but just what you would expect from a motel of this type. In short; nice if your in Memphis to visit Graceland. If you want to see more of the downtown area better look for a hotel/motel closer to downtown.

HotelInfo.Name: Colonial Inn & Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 1952 East Shelby Drive, Memphis, TN 38116
